features: 【Provide Perfect Support】With perfect curves shape design, this memory foam travel pillow can better fix your neck, prevents head from falling forward, relieves neck pain during travel. The added adjustable rope lock, you can adjust the angle and the size of the pillow randomly, meeting different neck size requirements, choose to provide support and comfort where you need it.

【New Design Sweat-Resistant/ Washable Cover】Our memory foam pillow is covered with breathable and super soft magnetic therapy cloth, millions of tiny premium microbeads inside, a self-developed sweat-resistant fabric, provides the maximum comfort on your trip. The pillowcase is machine washable, so you will always get a fresh and clean pillow on your journey.

【New Design Premium Memory Foam】Enjoy our superior-quality memory foam travel pillow. The luxury memory foam filler use the 5 seconds return technology, comfort and durable, cushions the body and relieves painful pressure points for ultimate relaxation.

【The Best Choice For Travel】Everyone need a high quality memory foam travel neck pillow. This pillow can provides extra support to protect the neck from pain when you are sitting in the seat on a plane, car, train or bus. It's also a good ideal for home. When you are watching TV, reading at home, and make you work easier in the office work nap. You can also purchase for your relatives, friends, colleagues and parents. It is a perfect gift.

【Space Saving and Light Weight Package】The product size is 11x9.2x4.6 inches, the weight of the package is 0.6 lbs. The MLVOC Travel Neck Pillow was designed for portability and comfort. It comes with an improved travel bag that allows the neck pillow to compress down to ½ its size. With its snap strap, this pillow can be attached to your carry on luggage without taking up extra space.

We improved the memory foam pillow from a slow rebound process to a upgraded fast rebound effect.Make the pillow more elastic and Supportive,Meanwhile we have been tested for 1 year, memory foam stored for 1 year will not change original shape. How should I use the pillow properly after receiving it for the first time? The product is sealed in a gift box, so it can not be ventilated in transit; consumers who are particularly sensitive to the smell are advised to put the pillow in the vent for 24-72 hours before use. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My second review, one day after delivery
reviews.reviewText: I wrote a 5-star review yesterday after receiving this neck pillow. It hasn't posted yet, but I'm going to amend my review after wearing this neck pillow yesterday. First, I'll just say that I wish I could give it more than 5-stars. This neck pillow is more of a neck brace and for someone like me who has arthritis in the neck, it's more than just a pillow to use for a long plane flight. I bought it for an upcoming 10-hour flight from NY to Athens, Greece. I had purchased another neck pillow from Amazon and returned it, it didn't give great support, was bulky and the covering over it was too 'fuzzy' and made me hot. I returned that one. This has a cover that's smooth and comfortable and zips off for washing. Very practical.Just look at the design and how the sides are upright, not rounded like most common neck pillows. It makes sense that if the sides are vertical, it will keep your head vertical and not leaning to one side or forwards. I bought the model with the slide-clip front in front, rather than the model with two strings that tie. The strap is stretchy and each side easily clips together. The strap can be adjusted for length. I prefer it snug, the two sides almost touch when closed, but that's a personal preference. The memory foam is firm enough to keep your head upright, but soft enough to be very comfortable and easy enough to roll up tight and put it in the little drawstring pouch it came with. The eye shades and ear plugs are a nice extra bonus, but the star is the pillow itself. I have hardly taken it off since I got it. The pain in my neck just instantly dissolved.I'm on my laptop a lot, which adds to my neck strain. Wearing this neck 'pillow' which is more of a comfortable neck brace, just totally removes any neck pain or strain. I always do my 'due diligence' before purchasing anything on Amazon, the reviews are helpful. I hope my review helps someone decide to buy this neck pillow. It's just the best find I've had on Amazon this year. I'm grateful to the designer and manufacturer for putting out a quality product that's portable, comfortable, economical and actually does what it's meant to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neck Pillow That Actually Supports
reviews.reviewText: I had a couple of these over the years that felt nice but just didn't have substance to them. This pillow feels like dense memory foam that soft and slowly compresses and cradles your head softly but securely. Other pillows have always sunk instead of supporting the head and leave you with a kink in your neck. Having this before flying 27k+ miles in less than a week was a lifesaver, especially doing a 17.5hr flight starting it off. This allowed me to rest comfortably watching movies as well as actually sleep comfortably. The smell some complain about are either old reviews or extremely sensitive people and I'll explain why. Upon receiving the pillow it was in a vented bag instead of a box which even included instructions along with an explanation that they switched packaging to let the product air out. It had a mild chemical smell to it but not strong like vehicle floor liners I've got off here for example. Simply leaving it out for a couple days aired it out and it was ready to go. The eye mask was handy when the plane was lit and I used my own ear plugs with noise canceling instead of the foam ones provided. Washing the cover after the trip and putting it back on was simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars travelers must have
reviews.reviewText: The Travel Pillow with 100% Pure Memory Foam and a Comfortable & Breathable Cover has proven to be a game-changer for my travel experiences, offering unparalleled comfort and support for my neck and head.The standout feature of this travel pillow is the 100% pure memory foam construction. The memory foam conforms to the shape of my neck, providing customized support and alleviating any discomfort during long flights, road trips, or even quick naps. The memory foam's responsiveness ensures a supportive yet comfortable feel, adapting to my body's contours.The comfortable and breathable cover enhances the overall experience. The soft fabric feels gentle against the skin, and the breathable design prevents overheating during extended use. The cover is also removable and machine-washable, making it easy to keep the pillow clean and fresh for every journey.The ergonomic design of the travel pillow is another standout feature. It provides optimal neck and head support, preventing stiffness and discomfort associated with long periods of sitting. The pillow's shape and size strike a perfect balance between compact portability and effective support.The snap closure adds to the convenience of the travel pillow. It allows for easy attachment to luggage or bags, ensuring that the pillow is readily accessible during travel without taking up valuable space. The compact design makes it a practical and essential travel accessory.One standout experience was during a long-haul flight. The travel pillow provided consistent support, allowing me to rest comfortably and arrive at my destination without the usual neck stiffness. The compact size made it easy to carry, and the snap closure kept it securely attached to my backpack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, much better than other travel pillows, and yet still less expensive
reviews.reviewText: I have only had a chance to use this a couple of times so far, so we will see how long it holds up, but initially this pillow has much better support than others. Between firm memory foam and well placed drawstrings, this pillow actually allows you to relax, without feeling that you need to exert any energy to keep it in place, or compressing so much that it is like having nothing there at all to support your head.It is also very easy to roll and put back in its travel bag, so it does not take up much space.The true test will be to see how it holds up after multiple users and washing (following the directions) but so far this seems like a good investment.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es cómodo pero no me ayudo a dormir
reviews.reviewText: No pude conciliar el sueño. Molesta un poco en mi caso por el cuello más chico tal vez.
Been traveling with this set, the cushion is fantastic, great quality product, happy with purchase.
Fabulous great comfort and love the fact it folds up and not taken a lot of room in travel bag
They worked and are very comfortable.
